instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2914: What is 820-2914? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> White screen without ? mark.
threads.message:
I have this board that boots, chimes and PRAM's. It will boot to white screen and never give ? or search for other boot devices when holding down "option" key. Also cannot boot to recovery.

I have already tried another BIOS from a known working board for testing.

I am aware that this will most likely show signs of a bad GPU at some point but would still like to know what this issue could be.

Thanks. Have a good one.






Update - Resolved. Thanks anyway. have a good one.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> White screen without ? mark.
